"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5523644c6368726c9a5a1300#post_5523644c6368726c9a5a1300
Well to be fair the new game is going to be a parallel timeline where the villain isn't Illias but that a unforseen force of chaos is destroying things and is a threat to both sides.

The core difference between the two games:
MGQ original trilogy: good is the villain
MGQ paradox: chaos is the villain
